main: ^Looking for votes eh? I only vote for politicians who know their math. Answer this.
^I have an ordinary, fair dice that can roll 420 times. How many times is the number 3 expected?

c-0: ^140 times? At least the other guy knew his math.
c-1: ^How pathetic, you don't even know simple math. No vote for you!
c-2: ^Correct! You sure know your math. Impressive! You got my vote!
